title: Travel: Documents (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Documents subcategory within Travel. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.english: A passport is a must for an international trip.
cards.romaji: Kaigairyoko ni pasupoto wa hissu da.
cards.japanese: 海外旅行にパスポートは必須だ。
パスポートがあります。
